creator: BBFC
descriptionHtml:
Find out the latest UK film and DVD/Blu-ray age ratings from the British Board of Film Classification (BBFC). Use this app to find the latest age ratings, trailers, cinema and video on demand releases - so you can choose what’s right for you and your family.

The BBFC is independent and not-for-profit, and here to help everyone in the UK – especially children and families – choose age-appropriate films, videos and websites, wherever and however they watch or use them.   

By regularly consulting with thousands of people across the country, and working closely with the film and digital industries, with educators and organisations dedicated to children’s welfare, we are continually evolving the guidance we offer. So increasingly we are able to make a bigger difference in helping everyone – children, families and adults – choose well.
descriptionShort: Find age ratings for the latests films, DVDs and content on streaming services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Updated the information about BBFC ratings

rated.label: Mature 17+
